member.name: IRemoteComputer.Initialize
member.summary: Used by Windows Explorer or Windows Internet Explorer when it is initializing or enumerating a namespace extension invoked on a remote computer.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer containing the machine name of the remote computer.
A value that is set to TRUE if Windows Explorer is enumerating the namespace extension, or FALSE if it is initializing it.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or standard OLE error values otherwise.

member.name: IRemoteComputer
member.summary: Exposes a method that enumerates or initializes a namespace extension when it is invoked on a remote object. This interface is used, for example, to initialize the remote printers virtual folder.
